name: Stripo Email Design Platform
description: Stripo leveled up! Our brand-new editor introduces AI Hub, real-time co-editing, commenting, and more—giving teams a seamless workflow for email creation. Whether you're a marketer, designer, or enterprise team, collaborate and create emails faster than ever!
label: AI, teamwork, and a new era of email design
label_zh: AI、团队合作以及电子邮件设计的新时代
content_zh: Stripo 升级了！我们的全新编辑器引入了 AI Hub、实时协作编辑、评论等功能，为团队提供无缝的电子邮件创建流程。无论你是市场营销人员、设计师还是企业团队，都能比以往更快地协同创作电子邮件。

name: SimplAI
description: A single platform for building, deploying, and managing Agentic AI in any environment - on-prem, cloud, or hybrid. It provides robust governance, security, and scalability, so you can launch AI applications simpler and faster.
label: The simplest and fastest way to build and deploy Agentic AI
label_zh: 构建和部署代理AI最简单快捷的方法
content_zh: 一个平台，用于在任何环境中构建、部署和管理代理型AI，无论是本地、云端还是混合环境。它提供强大的治理、安全性和可扩展性，让你能够更简单、更快地推出AI应用。

name: Scene 2.0 - Modular AI Web Builder
description: Scene is redefining the way modern websites are created—enabling designers and agency teams to ideate, build, and publish websites from a single canvas, with AI empowering their ideation process without limiting customization or creativity.
label: The smart way to build websites
content_zh: Scene 2.0 - Modular AI Web Builder 正在重新定义现代网站的创建方式，让设计师和团队能够在一个平台上构思、构建和发布网站。通过AI技术，它能够激发创意过程，同时不影响自定义和创造力。

name: Moio
description: Moio is a design tool that allows designers to build functional product design, not just static images. Design and test real user flows, eliminate the gap between mockups and final products, and streamline your product development process.
label: The future app builder for designers
label_zh: 面向设计师的未来应用构建工具
content_zh: Moio 是一个设计工具，它能让设计师创建功能性的产品设计，而不仅仅是静态图片。你可以设计和测试真实的用户流程，消除原型图和最终产品之间的差距，并简化你的产品开发过程。

name: Redactable
description: Redactable uses AI to find and permanently remove sensitive information from documents—unlike traditional methods that leave data vulnerable to bad actors. Save 98% of time while ensuring protection across legal, healthcare, and financial sectors.
label: Protect your sensitive data in documents before sharing them
label_zh: 保护文档中的敏感数据后再分享
content_zh: Redactable 利用 AI 技术查找并永久删除文档中的敏感信息，与传统方法不同的是，它能有效防止数据被不法分子利用。使用 Redactable 可以节省 98% 的时间，并确保在法律、医疗和金融领域的信息安全。

name: ActionKit
description:
With a single API call, ActionKit (by Paragon) equips your product's AI agents with 1000+ integration actions across CRMs, ticketing platforms, email, Slack, and more.
Paragon is trusted by enterprise AI companies like AI21, You.com, and Copy.ai.
label: Instantly add 1000+ integration actions to your AI agent
label_zh: 立即为您的AI代理添加1000多个集成操作
content_zh:
通过一次API调用，ActionKit（由Paragon提供）就能让你产品的AI代理接入超过1000种集成操作，涵盖CRM系统、工单平台、电子邮件、Slack等。
Paragon得到了像AI21、You.com和Copy.ai这样的企业级AI公司的信赖。

name: Kilo Code for VS Code
description: Kilo AI is an AI-powered extension for VS Code which writes, fixes and improves your code through simple chat. Tuned with the fastest models we could find, it can create and modify files, run command line prompts, and much more.
label: Lightning speed autonomous AI coding agent
label_zh: 闪电速度自主AI编码助手
content_zh: Kilo Code for VS Code 是一个基于人工智能的 Visual Studio Code 扩展，可以通过简单的聊天来编写、修复和改进代码。它使用了我们能找到的最快模型，能够创建和修改文件、运行命令行提示以及其他更多功能。

name: Docko
description: Your virtual pet in your macOS Dock
label: Your virtual pet in your macOS dock
label_zh: 你的macOS程序坞中的虚拟宠物
content_zh: 你的macOS Dock里的虚拟宠物

name: xAutoDM
description: xAutoDM uses advanced AI to automate personalized Twitter DMs that get 5x higher response rates and convert more leads into customers.
label: Twitter Cold DMs that help you scale your business
label_zh: Twitter 冷私信，助您扩展业务
content_zh: xAutoDM 利用先进的 AI 技术自动发送个性化的 Twitter 私信，回复率比普通私信高出五倍，能更有效地将潜在客户转化为实际客户。

name: Atono
description: Atono is an all-in-one platform for agile, cross-functional teams building web apps. Get essential features like roadmapping, story writing, feature flagging, bug reporting, and usage tracking to plan, build, run, and improve your product – all in one place.
label: Plan, build, run, and improve your product in one place
label_zh: 规划、构建、运行和改进您的产品，一站式搞定。
topics_zh: 任务管理，生产力，开发者工具
content_zh: Atono 是一个面向敏捷跨职能团队的全方位平台，用于构建网页应用。它提供了一系列核心功能，如路线图规划、故事编写、特性标记、错误报告和使用跟踪，帮助你在一个平台上完成产品的计划、构建、运行和改进。

name: NOAN
description: NOAN is your Superhuman Business Partner. Collaborate with an accurate AI assistant at every step of your business building journey. Connect it to all your most important workflows and apps. Automate & talk to your business.
label: Your superhuman business partner
content_zh: NOAN 是你的超级商业伙伴。在你构建业务的每一步，都能与一个精准的人工智能助手合作。将它连接到你所有重要的工作流程和应用程序中，实现自动化并与你的业务进行对话。

name: XSPACESTREAM
description: Get complete transcripts, summaries, and insights from any X/Twitter Space. Ask AI Chat questions and get immediate answers about the content.
label: Discover what's being said on X spaces using AI
label_zh: 利用AI探索X空间中的讨论内容
content_zh: 获取任何X/Twitter Space的完整文字记录、摘要和见解。向AI聊天助手提问，立即获得关于内容的答案。

name: EmemeAI
description: Bring your AI-WAIFU to LIFE♡ Without code, You can create 3D chat AI characters, and connect them to external apps, social media, metaverse and games to use as AI-NPCs. They generate not only chat, but also voices and animations. It's free.
label: Create & Export AI characters to apps and games
label_zh: 创建并导出AI角色到应用程序和游戏中
content_zh: 你可以轻松创建3D聊天AI角色，无需编写代码。这些角色可以连接到外部应用、社交媒体、元宇宙和游戏中，作为AI-NPC使用。它们不仅能生成对话，还能生成语音和动画。而且这一切都是免费的。

name: Grok for Android
description: Grok is an Al-powered assistant, developed by xAl, designed to be maximally truthful, useful, and curious. Get answers to any question, generate striking images, and upload pictures to gain a deeper understanding of your world.
label: The official app by xAl
content_zh: Grok 是由 xAl 开发的一款 AI 助手，旨在提供最真实、实用和有趣的信息。无论是回答问题、生成引人注目的图片，还是上传照片以更深入地了解世界，Grok 都能帮你实现。

name: Reachfast.ai
description: Reachfast lets you skip LinkedIn’s wait time and connect instantly. Just drop a LinkedIn URL and get direct phone numbers & emails from a 385M+ database. Perfect for sales & recruiting—get a YES or NO in under 5 minutes. Speed wins. Reachfast delivers.
label: Find direct dials and emails of 385m+ professionals
label_zh: 找到3.85亿多名专业人士的直拨电话和电子邮件
content_zh: Reachfast 让你跳过 LinkedIn 的等待时间，立即建立联系。只需输入一个 LinkedIn 链接，就能从包含超过 3.85 亿条记录的数据库中获取直接电话号码和电子邮件。非常适合销售和招聘，在五分钟内得到明确的答复。速度决定成败，Reachfast 为你提供支持。
